title: Adult Literacy Education Design Through Integration of Local Cultural Discourses

context.prior_knowledge: Basic literacy skills and general understanding of regional culture
context.additional_context: Learners experience literacy activities utilizing local culture in daily life, analyzing and sharing cultural materials via personal devices. The program focuses on cultivating project execution skills linked to fieldwork.

learning_goals: Learners can comprehend local culture-related texts (traditional documents, oral materials, etc.) with at least 80% accuracy.
Learners can create creative literacy artifacts reflecting local cultural discourse through PBL projects.
Learners improve their ability to interpret literacy materials by two or more levels through peer feedback (based on a 5-point scale).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
